title: biocompute_line_type.txt
Description: name - refers to line types in biocompute objects. Lines preceded by '_' means that the field is not mutable by the user who is runniung the biocompute object
title - refers to human readable name of the line. This fields can be empty.
description - refers to the description of the line type

biocompute_object.name: id
biocompute_object.title: id
biocompute_object.description: This is the object id. The id is a unique identifying value assigned to each object. This value is used for all references to this object.

biocompute_object.name: type
biocompute_object.title: type
biocompute_object.description: This field defines the type of the object.

biocompute_object.name: title
biocompute_object.title: title
biocompute_object.description: The user-defined name of the object/type. It can be any type of text.

biocompute_object.name: version
biocompute_object.title: version
biocompute_object.description: records the versioning of the object

biocompute_object.name: creation_date
biocompute_object.title: creation date
biocompute_object.description: The time and date that the biocompute object is created.

biocompute_object.name: modification_date
biocompute_object.title: modification date
biocompute_object.description: This field will list all the dates and time an object is modified.

biocompute_object.name: verification_status
biocompute_object.title: Verification Status
biocompute_object.description: Describes the position of an object in the verification process. The 'unreviewed' flag indicates that the object has been submitted, but no further evaluation or verification has occurred. The 'in_progress' flag indicates that verification is underway. the 'reviewed' flag indicates that the biocompute object has been verified and reviewed. The 'manual' flag indicates that the object has been manually verified. The 'suspended' flag indicates an object that was once valid is no longer considered valid. The 'error' flag indicates that an error was detected with the biocompute object.

biocompute_object.name: publication_status
biocompute_object.title: publication status
biocompute_object.description: This is a choice field with four options. The 'draft' flag indicates that an object is in draft form and is still being edited. The 'open access' flag indicates that an object has been published and is freely available to anyone. The objects with the 'private' flag have restrictions on who can view and access them. This is a way for researchers using restricted data or metadata to insure the confidentially is maintained.

biocompute_object.name: usability_domain
biocompute_object.title: usability domain
biocompute_object.description: This field provides a space for the author to define the usability domane of an object. The usability domain along with keywords can help determine when and how the biocompute object can be used. Novel use of the biocompute object should result in the creation of a new entry.

biocompute_object.name: authors
biocompute_object.title: Authors
biocompute_object.description: This is the list of authors submitting this object. First and last name are required, middle name and affiliation are not. The affiliation field is for listing the academic, governmental, or private entity that supported the project responsible for generating the biocompute object.

biocompute_object.name: keywords
biocompute_object.title: Keywords
biocompute_object.description: Keywords to aid in search-ability and description of the object. These are a set of controlled vocabulary.

biocompute_object.name: db_id_list
biocompute_object.title: Database ID key-value list
biocompute_object.description: The db_id_list allow for the ability to cross reference curated scientific resources associated with a specific workflow. Disease Ontology, Gene Ontology, Sequence Ontology, etc.

biocompute_object.name: pipeline
biocompute_object.title: Pipeline
biocompute_object.description: The id of the pipeline that is used to a the biocompute object.

biocompute_object.name: parameters
biocompute_object.title: Parameters
biocompute_object.description: A list of the parmaeters that are accessable by the user for this biocompute object.

biocompute_object.name: verification_kit
biocompute_object.title: Verification Kit
biocompute_object.description: mechanism that allows the user to verify the workflow

author.name: middle
author.title: Middle Name/Other Name
author.description: Middle or other name of author

author.name: orcid
author.title: ORCID ID
author.description: A unique identifier for researchers and scholars

pipeline_definition.name: workflow
pipeline_definition.title: Workflow
pipeline_definition.description: Workflow features for the pipeline object

pipeline_definition.name: script
pipeline_definition.title: Launcher Script
pipeline_definition.description: Script used to launch the process

pipeline_definition.name: tool_used
pipeline_definition.title: Tool Used
pipeline_definition.description: This field is for describing all information about the specific bioinformatic tools used. name and version fields are present, as well as the argument field. The argument field is a plural field and should be used for each individual argument of each tool.
